translation: Thank you for your applause!
transcript: 谢谢大家的掌声啊。

translation: Today I'd like to talk about my attitude to my daily life, work and creation.
transcript: 那个，啧我呢今天在这里呢讲的是我的一个态度，我的一个观点以及我平时生活、我的工作、我的创作一直一一一直以来的一种态度。

translation: That is, to take things as they come.
transcript: 自然而然。

transcript: 这是我小时候，我的一张照片。

translation: I think the way a person behaves, the work he undertakes, and even his design philosophy, his artistic views and his own growth are absolutely inseparable from the life he is facing.
transcript: 因为我觉得啧每个人做的事情，每个人做的工作，每个人哪怕他的设计哲学，他的艺术观点和他自己的这个成长，和他自己所面对的这个生活是绝对分不开的。

translation: This photo was taken when I was very little.
transcript: 这张照片是我很小的时候拍的。

translation: In fact, I am a congenital disabled person.
transcript: 嗯其实我是一个先天性的残疾人。

translation: I was born with a deformity.
transcript: 从小生出来是一个畸形的。

translation: Uh, my leg was deformed and coiled on my body.
transcript: 没呃我的腿是畸形盘在身上的。

translation: And it was only after more than 20 surgeries that I became what I am now.
transcript: 然后经过二十几次的手术，变成现在的一个人的样子。

translation: You can see that my feet, in black socks, are abnormally thick.
transcript: 那这张照片是你可以看到我的这个袜子很粗，黑色的袜子。

translation: Actually I just had my surgery completed and had a plaster cast on my foot.
transcript: 啊其实当时是刚刚做好手术，做好手术呢它绑个石膏。

translation: And then my mother took this photo for me.
transcript: 然后呢我妈妈给我拍了这张照片。

translation: Then, there was a new animation from Japan called Astro Boy.
transcript: 然后呢当时有一个刚刚进来的日本动画叫《阿童木》。

translation: My mother always encouraged me by saying I was like the Astro Boy.
transcript: 妈妈就一直鼓励我，你就像一个阿童木一样。

translation: I liked such a heroic figure at that time.
transcript: 我当时也很喜欢这样一个英雄式的人物。

translation: Recently, I took out the photo, and I found my legs on plaster are just like Astro Boy's. So I also drew a fire-breathing device under my feet.
transcript: 就是在现在，我就把这张照片会拿出来，我画了这个喷火的这个这个装置，因为阿童木有一个红色的，呵他的这个腿就和石膏一样。

translation: That's a natural me.
transcript: 所以说呢，这就是一个很非常自然的一个我。

translation: I was born in this way.
transcript: 呃老天我诞生在这个地球上，我就是这样的一个形态。

translation: But I never felt depressed about it.
transcript: 啊但是我从来没有觉得不舒服，因为我觉得很好，啊。

translation: I 've done many things and various kinds of work.
transcript: 后来呢我就做了好多的事情，我做了很多的工作。

translation: Design.
transcript: 我做设计工作。

translation: Public artistic creation.
transcript: 我做公共艺术创作。

translation: Curation.
transcript: 我做策展工作。

translation: Teaching.
transcript: 我做教学工作。

translation: Personal creation.
transcript: 我做个人创作。

translation: Many friends worried about me for undertaking too much for my handicapped body.
transcript: 好多朋友都在问我，刘毅你的身体已经这样了，怎么还会弄那么多的事情，行不行啊？

translation: So I started to introspect, "Why do I sometimes want to do so many things?"
transcript: 我觉得我就在想我为什么，我也在思考、在反思，有时候为什么我会有这样的一种想法，想做那么多事情？

translation: Why am I so "greedy"?
transcript: 为什么我那么“贪心”？

translation: Later on, I realized, since I lack some things.
transcript: 啊可能我发现了，是因为我缺少一部分的东西。

translation: I may take the things I can do in my life, my work and my creation to establish an exchange with the public and with everyone.
transcript: 所以说我会用我的生命当中的这个我能做的事情，我的工作、啊我的创作、我的创造来建立与公众、与大众、与大家的一种交流。

translation: I'm not able to establish enough communication physically.
transcript: 因为我的身体交流的方式不够。

translation: I can't rush to your side and talk to you.
transcript: 我不没法跑到你面前，跟你说。

translation: I may not go if it's a distant place.
transcript: 很难跑到你面前跟你主动打招呼，啊很难呵很远的地方我可能就放弃了，

translation: But my work is the way I communicate with the world.
transcript: 但是我会通过我的工作。

transcript: 所以说互动对我来说是非常重要的一个词，啊。

transcript: 当然我在做很多公共艺术的创作的时候，也会考虑一种互动。

translation: However, the interaction I prefer to convey should be natural.
transcript: 但这种互动呢，啧我一直在想，我我我我想营造的互动绝对不是呃我想营造的互动是自然而然发生的。

translation: Rather than an interaction produced when the people are instructed to make a specific movement.
transcript: 它不应该它不会是一种啧说明书啊，你得到这里来，你得动一下，然后产生了某种互动。

translation: So I kept thinking over my works.
transcript: 嘶所以说我一直在思考我的作品。

translation: I created a work named Traces 8 years ago.
transcript: 八年前我做了一件作品叫《痕迹》。

translation: It was a desk and a chair.
transcript: 其实我就设计了一张桌子和一张椅子。

translation: I only made a set of it, not in batches.
transcript: 其实我的一个这就这么一一组作品，啊它不是批量生产的。

translation: I found on Taobao an interesting, temperature sensitive material.
transcript: 然后我就用了当时有一个有意思的材料，也在淘宝上面找到的，嗯用了一个材料，然后它可以感温。

translation: So I made it into a furniture work.
transcript: 然后我就做了这样的一个家具作品。

translation: It can fade into the color of wood as the temperature of the person who touches it changes.
transcript: 它通过人的温度的变化，它可以褪去它的颜色，然后它还原它原来木头的颜色。

translation: Then it records every touch.
transcript: 然后它就记录了一切。

translation: When the person leaves it.
transcript: 过去了以后，人离开了以后。

translation: It returns to its original color.
transcript: 它又返回它原来的颜色。

translation: This was a result from my thoughts on how to create a natural exchange or interaction when a person uses the furniture.
transcript: 就是说我觉得这也是我在当时就在思考一种如何自然而然的人过来，他在使用家具时候，会产生的一种交流和一种互动。

translation: This was a result from my thoughts on how to create a natural exchange or interaction when a person uses the furniture.
transcript: 《贫民窟的箱子》是我在呃之前做的一件作品。

translation: I'm fond of slums.
transcript: 我是对贫民窟非常喜欢。

translation: Slums may impress you with dirty and messy places, but I perceived intelligence there.
transcript: 当然贫民窟会给大家印象是脏乱差，可能呃对我的印象里面还有一个部分，可能是非常智慧的。

translation: It strikes me that slums are a marvelous form of architecture. In spite of the structure and interrelated buildings, a myriad of families live here without disputes and interference.
transcript: 它这种建筑的结构，建筑的这种互相之间的这种关系，建筑之间在这种邻里邻里避免纠纷，啊邻里补互不影响，是非常厉害的一种建筑形式。

translation: It's fairly hard for an architect to reproduce a slum.
transcript: 如果让一个建筑师重新再去复制一个贫民窟，那是非常难的。

translation: So I was inspired by such a community and created a work, a furniture work.
transcript: 后来我就又把这样一个社区变成了一个工呃变成了一个作品，变成了一个家具作品。

translation: It's a cabinet.
transcript: 它是一个柜子。

translation: Different parts of it do not interfere with each other.
transcript: 啊然后呢这个柜子就是互不干扰。

translation: Every part of a single box can be opened and has its function.
transcript: 啊它每个BOX里面，每个部分都可以打开，都可以使用，它是有功能的。

translation: Then I got a good opportunity to reproduce a community with such cabinets.
transcript: 然后呢很好的机会，我又做用这个柜子又还原了一个社区，又回到了一个现场。

translation: Once, I created a public work in downtown.
transcript: 我把有一次机会在市中心，做了这样的一个公共作品。

translation: That's a combination of containers and my slum boxes, which is also a community fantasy.
transcript: 集装箱和贫民窟的箱子的结合变成了一个新的社区，又有一种新的幻想。

translation: Of course, those containers also have their functions.
transcript: 当然这些集装箱里面也是有功能的。

translation: Which include gallery, canteen, café, cinema, etc.
transcript: 画廊、餐厅、咖啡厅、电影院等等等等。

translation: Then I'd like to show you three pavilions I created.
transcript: 然后呢我跟大家再介绍三个亭子，我做的亭子。

translation: I think when public works of art are put into a public area, people can have direct interaction with them.
transcript: 因为我觉得公共艺术所有的公共作品出来，你进来，这种互动是非常直接的。

translation: So I drew inspiration from the autumn leaves of plane trees in Shanghai and created an art work.
transcript: 所以说我在在做了一个一片落叶的作品，呃非常上海的梧桐的秋天的一件作品。

translation: It's a pavilion, and also a major sculpture.
transcript: 然后它是一个亭子，它是一个圆它也是一件大的雕塑啊。

translation: Under which small exhibitions can be held.
transcript: 但是呢它里面也可以做一个小的展览。

translation: Under the pavilion, or the leaves, I displayed works of my students, young designers and artists.
transcript: 我的学生的展览都在里面，我把年轻的设计师，艺术家的作品在这个亭子下面、叶子下面进行展览。

translation: Besides, I made another pavilion.
transcript: 我也做了一个亭子。

translation: It was to celebrate the Year of Snake in 2013.
transcript: 啊它是为了庆祝当时2013年蛇年的时候。

translation: Through the work, the public could receive the new year's blessing.
transcript: 啊一个耳熟能详的公众都能了解到的一个关于新年的一个祝福的一个这样的作品。

translation: I adopted neon lights, the symbol familiar to people, the form of pavilion and the shape of snake.
transcript: 用了霓虹灯，用了大家都熟悉的符号，用了亭子的形式，用了蛇的造型。

translation: The public work is erected on the Nanli Squre of Shanghai Xintiandi.
transcript: 出现了这样的一件公共作品，在新天地的南里广场。

translation: It was welcomed by people.
transcript: 然后所有的公众也进来了，非常欢迎他们。

translation: Here are photos showing the lighting effects.
transcript: 霓虹灯。

translation: In 2016, Shanghai Seed Project was undertaken in Shanghai.
transcript: 然后呢在2016年我们呃上海有一个项目，叫上海种子项目。

translation: I worked as a public art researcher and created for children a space at the Century Park of Pudong.
transcript: 我负责作为一个呃公共艺术研究员，创作了为孩子创造了一个空间，在在那个浦东的世纪公园。

translation: You can see at the left bottom of the screen, the work is like a planet.
transcript: 你可以看到这里呃左下角是这个作品，它就像一个星球一样。

translation: During that time, I kept thinking how to make the "planet" more fascinating.
transcript: 我一直在思考就是如何让这些星球变得有意思？

translation: How can I make the public who interact with it curious about the future?
transcript: 如何让这种星球变得，当当时是探讨未来。

translation: I actually made some holes on its surface.
transcript: 其实我是挖了好多洞。

translation: So the children came into the pavilion and enjoyed all the settings in there, the inclined structure, all the installations and various relaxing ways.
transcript: 让所有的小朋友，让所有的公众劳来到这个建筑里面、亭子里面，通过不同的高度，不同的装置的设置,不同的游玩的方式。

translation: They may also stick out their heads from small or big holes and see the outside world.
transcript: 出头从不同的洞，大小的洞里面钻出来，然后再看另外一边的世界。

translation: The pavilion has two sides.
transcript: 然后这有正反两面的，啊。

translation: In fact, I only made a cloth to separate the world into the present and the future.
transcript: 然后这种对其实我只是去做了一片布，然后分割了两个世界，一个现在的，一个可能就是未来的。

translation: It has functions inside.
transcript: 然后在这里边是有功能的。

translation: Children may play in it in different ways, and may stick their heads out from different holes.
transcript: 啊所有的人小孩子可以在这里面玩儿，啊可以去不同的方式的玩儿，不同的方式探头，啊。

translation: I also invited many children to create seeds with me.
transcript: 然后呢我也邀请了许多小朋友一起跟我创作种子。

translation: I chose a lot of seeds painted by them and continued to make creations.
transcript: 我选了好多的种子，孩子画的，然后继续在这个作品上面进行创作。

transcript: 到作品最后的一天，它这个作品的每天的形态，每天的符号，每天的这个色彩都在变化当中。

transcript: 这是让我非常享受的，这是让我觉得是公共艺术当中是让我非常吸引我的地方。

translation: Because I was like an observer who created such a stage and such a space where all the public would have new performances every day before me.
transcript: 因为我就像一个观察者一样，我创造了这样的一个舞台，创造了这样的一个空间，让所有的公众来表演，让所有的公众在我面前每天都有新的表演。

translation: So to speak, public art works are ever changing.
transcript: 所以说多作品是没有结束的那一天的。

translation: Then I created this work, Hey, human!
transcript: 然后我做了《嘿，人类》这件作品。

transcript: 我做了一个秋千，然后呢这个秋千就发生在公共空间，公共场所里面，它在动。

translation: Its original theme is the exciting moment when humans are created.
transcript: 但是原本这个故事的主题就是创造人类的那激动人激动的那一刹那。

translation: Due to the participation of the public and different ways to play it.
transcript: 然后因为我们的公众的参与，大家玩儿的方式不一样。

translation: The outcome may be more diversified and fascinating, and a new story formed.
transcript: 它最后带来的结果可能是更多样性的，更好玩儿的，它重新再说一个新的故事。

translation: This outcome was unexpected, for I only made a swing.
transcript: 这个是我我一开始也无法去预计的，但是我只是给它造了一个秋千。

translation: Children had a great fun with it.
transcript: 小孩子玩得很疯，很开心。

translation: Then, another version of the swing showed up in the gallery, at the exhibition of Yu Deyao last year.
transcript: 然后呢这些秋千就会有第二件版本在美术馆里面，在余德耀去年的展出。

translation: Its state was a little bit different.
transcript: 它的状态有一点不一样。

translation: You can see this video.
transcript: 大家可以看一下这个视频。

translation: This is in a mall.
transcript: 就在商场里面。

translation: And this is in the gallery.
transcript: 当然这是在美术馆里面。

translation: It's natural that people in the gallery played with the swing in a different way.
transcript: 但是我也觉得很有意思的地方是自然而然的，美术馆的这个大家玩的状态，和在公共空间里面玩的状态也是不一样。

translation: It's interesting, and I'm ready to accept both states.
transcript: 啊这个很有意思，我也很接受这种不同的状态。

translation: As for works made in my teaching process.
transcript: 然后我们的教学当中也是。

translation: These two works were made respectively in Sanlin ancient town and in Zhujiajiao.
transcript: 这两件作品是我们在呃一个是在三林古镇，一个是在朱家角。

translation: We took the students to exchange old objects with new ones among the local public for re-creation at the scene.
transcript: 我们带着学生用老物件呃用新物件去跟当地的公众交换老物件，进行再创作在现场。

translation: My thought was that the artist plus the public is then equal to a daily performance.
transcript: 然后我的想法就是艺术家加公众，然后等于一场日常的演出。

translation: With each party accounting for half.
transcript: 然后这个时候可能是50%，50%的比例。

transcript: 但也有可能经随着这个时间的变化，作品的创作，艺术家会越来越少。

transcript: 他隐在背后，最后公众是100%出现的。

translation: Then the daily performance will be carried out totally by the public.
transcript: 然后一场日常的演出是公众所带来的。

translation: I enjoy very much the uncertainty, and the performance that the public brings.
transcript: 这个是我非常享受的这种不确定性，非常享受这种公众带来的一种呃表演性。

translation: Well, here is something else I would like to share with you.
transcript: 大家可以看到这又是另外一个内容，啊我想跟大家分享的。

translation: Some paintings.
transcript: 是一些绘画。

transcript: 大家可以看到这些绘画和我前面的作品有关。

transcript: 其实是我在2015年4月14号这一天开始的一个创作。

translation: I painted through my mobile phone every day.
transcript: 我每天都会用手机画画。

transcript: 然后这个来源于是什么呢？

transcript: 来源于是我一次在用手机一个软件APP在和学生批改作业，然后发给他们，然后批着批着批着然后觉得哎呀我很想画画。

translation: And I found I was also good at it.
transcript: 我觉得我很会画画。

translation: I was pleased by the thought of being able to paint every day.
transcript: 我很开心，我能每天都能画画。

translation: I didn’t even need a studio to do it.
transcript: 我不需要工作室。

transcript: 我可以在出租车上，我可以在家里，可以在任何地方，车站，呃任何的商场，我任哪怕睡在床上，任何地方我都可以画画。

translation: I felt quite satisfied.
transcript: 我很满足。

translation: Then nothing could hold me back ever since then.
transcript: 然后我就一发不可收拾。

translation: I painted every day, about my daily life.
transcript: 每天都在绘画，每天都在绘画，我画的内容也是我生活当中的一个部分。

translation: These were made in 2016.
transcript: 这是2016年的。

translation: I did it every day.
transcript: 每天都有。

translation: And it has been almost 3 years.
transcript: 现在已经将近有3年了。

translation: These are excerpts from 2017, and from 2018.
Every time I completed one, I shared it to my Moments.
transcript: 然后我画好以后呢，我也自然而然地会把它分享到朋友圈里面。

translation: That actually made a small exhibition of my paintings in my Moments.
transcript: 每其实我这个每天的绘画就已经有了一个展览，一个朋友圈的一个小展览。

transcript: 每天都有一个大家都会有各种的评论，我也很享受。

transcript: 是当代作品还是新媒体作品，还是绘画作品还是什么什么？

transcript: 这可能就是一种创作，啊没关系。

transcript: 那刘毅你怎么收藏？

transcript: 啊我也不知道，我也不知道怎么弄。

transcript: 但是我觉得每天还在画，我觉得很开心，这个是我现在还在做的。

translation: I selected 12 paintings.

transcript: 用网络的这个绘画的这个电子媒介的绘画，然后转换到一个空间里面，变成了好多的再和living room呃这样一个客厅主题所回应的一个内容。

translation: I presented 12 different items in my phone, including my portrait, wall calendar, clothing, paintings.
transcript: 我产生了好多的12件不同的东西，有我的肖像，啊有我有有挂历，啊有服装，也有绘画。

transcript: 我还是储存在手机里面，也有做做成了小雕塑。

translation: As a matter of fact, each painting, including my carpet and my legs, is loaded with plenty stories. But since time is limited, I'm not going to detail them.
transcript: 其实每幅绘画都有好多好多故事，这里我也不展开讲，因为时间的关系，包括我做的地毯，啊，包括我的腿。

translation: The painting of legs, as you can see, is made on the basis of my childhood photo I showed you before.
transcript: 你大这个腿大家可以看到是回我当时我刚刚那个呃那个那张我的那个小孩子的照片。

translation: Then I created candles with it.
transcript: 然后我把这个腿做成了蜡烛。

translation: Last year when I was in Hokkaido of Japan.
transcript: 然后我去年在日本北海道驻留的时候。

translation: I made it into a new work by igniting the candles in the snowfield.
transcript: 也变成了又创造了一个新作品，把这个蜡烛在这个雪地里面燃烧了。

translation: At the scene I also had a light work, a balcony work and a work about the scenery outside the window.
transcript: 在这个现场，我也有一件灯光作品，啊这个现场有一个呃阳台的作品和一个窗户外的风景的作品。

translation: I selected 12 different paintings to respond to the space.
transcript: 用我手机呃用我选了12个不同的呃绘画来回应了这个空间。

translation: The paintings were later printed in a piece of newspaper.
transcript: 这个后来做了一张报纸。

translation: While I continue to create paintings on my mobile phone, I keep thinking over how to utilize them.
transcript: 那其实我在想一直在想我的手机绘画是我的一个一直在创造的一个状态，一直在创作，然后我就想怎么把它。

translation: And I realize, now that they came from the internet.
transcript: 它是它是来源于一种现代的一个虚拟的一个一个一个媒介，它就是在网上发生的。

translation: I have to return them to the internet.
transcript: 所以说我还是要回应到网上去。

translation: Therefore, I put all my mobile phone paintings on a website.
transcript: 那我就会把我从最早的时间到现在的所有的绘画，我把它编辑到了一个网站上。

translation: You may scan the QR code to see all of the paintings.
transcript: 我它可以大家扫了可以看到所有的绘画。

translation: When seeing it, perhaps you will feel that you are watching a movie of me.
transcript: 每一天每一天感觉你就在看我的一部电影。

translation: This is a work I made in Tongji University.
transcript: 这个是这一次在同济的一件作品呵。

translation: It's also quite natural, for it's shaped as the scenery of a mountain and also has the function of a public bench.
transcript: 也是自然而然的啊它它其实又是一个山的景色，山的一个一个小景，但是它其实又是一个公共座椅。

translation: That's what I always want to present.
transcript: 啊这个就是我一直想要表现的。

translation: That's a functional art work.
transcript: 呃它是一个它它，所有的人的参与是可能是带来某种功能的，可以给它直接使用的，它可能是一个功能性的艺术作品。

translation: To take things as they come is a theme of great influence on me.
transcript: 然后自然自然而自然而然这个主题对我来说也是一直对我来说影响很大。

translation: Just now, the heavy rain brought rolls of thunder.
transcript: 因为我从一开始到现在，就像刚刚我又想到，这个有一场大雨突如其来，啊呼噜噜噜噜噜在那里响。

translation: But if you regard the thunder as a noise, you may be wrong, for I consider it an applause that nature gave me.
transcript: 如果你把它看成了是噪音，你们就错了，我觉得它是一一个很有意思的一个自然的给予现场的一种鼓掌。

translation: Isn't this intriguing?
transcript: 呵这个就很有意思?

translation: So, to take things as they come is an attitude.
transcript: 所以说自然而然就是一种态度。

translation: I accept everything, and turn it into my work.
transcript: 我接受一切，然后把这接受的这一切转变成我的作品。

translation: Thank you!
transcript: 谢谢大家!
